ca.uwaterloo.softeng.advisor

Class AdvisorContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.softeng.advisor.AdvisorContextListener

  • public class AdvisorContextListener
extends java.lang.Object
    Sets up logging and a database connection and schedules a task to periodically update schedule information (instructor name). Adds the logger and db objects to the servlet context attributes for access by code in AdvisorServlet.
